extendedInfo.description: E6B+ performs all the standard calculations of an E6B Flight Computer and provides useful tools like:Weight and BalanceAltitude and Ground SpeedLeg TimerFunctions include:ConversionsWind Speed and DirectionHeading, Ground Speed and Wind Correction AngleCourse, Ground Speed and Wind Correction AngleTrue AirspeedRunway CrosswindsFuel ConsumptionSpeed, Distance and TimeDensity AltitudeDew Point and Relative HumidityHeat IndexFuel and Oil WeightWeight and BalanceLeg TimerFlight Instruments (Altitude and Ground Speed)Disclaimer: Use this application at your own risk. The pilot in command is solely responsible for assuring correct data and proper checking of the aircraft prior to flight.Please report any bugs found to help develop this application. It is very important to mention the input you entered. Contact me via email for requests or complaints.

reviews.title: About TAS
reviews.comment: Update: Author comments TAS is estimate based on IAS being 2% less per 1000 ft of altitude compared to TAS. A general and acceptable estimate. Thanks for clarification.   >> I like the app, but I have a question about how TAS can be calculated without entering temperature. If the author can answer this I would appreciate it.  Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: About TAS
reviews.comment: Plz update TAS with temp as its giving wrong computations thanks...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app, definitely recommend
reviews.comment: Wow! This app is truly great, its all those flying tools you\'d want in an app and more. I very much like the weight and balance section, it is very well put together and simple to use, the only complaint is that i think its useless to include oil weight and moment... But that\'s just me
reviews.author: Kyle Thompson

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Downloaded mostly for weight and balance. Works good for that and is easily customizable to your plane. Other functions look handy but haven\'t used them yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simplistic calculations
reviews.comment: Good quick reference for pilots, but not a good primary computer. As mentioned TAD is slightly off due to assumed temperatures. Also, Heat Index is WAY off; 2\302\260C @ 68% humidity returns almost a 65\302\260C Heat Index.  Think I\'ll keep my trusty aluminum E6B with me for a while longer.
reviews.author: Mike Parker

reviews.title: All in One
reviews.comment: Really recommended for fellow pilots for quick and easy Flight Calculations
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: Nice app but you cant create and save individual weight and moments of every aircraft registrations you fly or create custom aircraft and setups that are not included in app like C172M other than that very good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice one for weight and balance

reviews.comment: App doesnt exit when u press back button and gps remains active. Otherwise excellent app.

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: Its a great and useful app, well done to the developer, you have made my life as a pilot so much easier. keep it up, i recommend this app to all pilots with android systems

reviews.title: Simply The Best Free App
reviews.comment: Despite crashing in weight & Balance calculations, It accurately gives very important calculation.  The W &B addition is really nice and the developer is aware of the problem. He actually replied quickly in my email spoting to this problem and ensured me it all be fixed ASAP.
reviews.author: A Google User
